original_text: A person may do an evil thing so that you punish him with death. If you have hung his dead body on a tree, 23 you must not leave it there during the night. Be careful to bury it on the same day that he died. If someone's body is hanging on a tree, it shows that God has cursed him. So do not leave it there. The Lord your God is giving the land to you so that it belongs to you. So do not let evil things spoil your land.
korean_text: 사람이 만일 죽을 죄를 범하므로 네가 그를 죽여 나무 위에 달거든

sentences.original_text: A person may do an evil thing
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 악한 일을 할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: so that you punish him with death
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 그를 사형으로 처벌할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: If you have hung his dead body on a tree
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 그의 시체를 나무에 매달았다면

sentences.original_text: you must not leave it there during the night
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 밤 동안 그것을 거기에 두어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: on the same day that he died
If someone's body is hanging on a tree
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 어떤 사람의 시체가 나무에 매달려 있다면

sentences.original_text: it shows that God has cursed him
So do not leave it there
The Lord your God is giving the land to you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 당신의 하나님은 당신에게 땅을 주고 계십니다

sentences.original_text: so that it belongs to you
So do not let evil things spoil your land
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 악한 것들이 당신의 땅을 더럽히게 하지 마십시오
